attributes.additional_details: To not fine parents who take children out of school for 2 weeks of the year during term time to go on holiday as long as there is proof.
attributes.background: Abolish the school fines for patents taking children on holiday with proof of said holiday or at least look into it. Taking a child on holiday is educational for so many reason the history of the country learning how other countries and peoples culture and so many other reasons.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/658365
